SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.controllers

Class AuthenticationController

java.lang.Object
pt.uc.dei.controllers.AuthenticationController
@Path("/auth") public class AuthenticationController extends Object
REST controller for handling authentication requests.

- Provides an endpoint for user login. - Uses CDI dependency injection to access services. - Returns a JWT token upon successful authentication.

  • Method Details

    • login

      @POST @Path("/login") @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response login(@Valid @Valid LoginDTO user)
      Handles user login and returns a JWT authentication token.
      Parameters:
      user - The login request containing email and password.
      Returns:
      HTTP 200 (OK) with a JWT token if authentication is successful, otherwise HTTP 401 (Unauthorized) if login fails.

    • logout

      @POST @Path("/logout") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response logout(@Context jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, @CookieParam("jwt") String jwtToken)
      Handles user logout by clearing the JWT cookie.
      Parameters:
      response - The HTTP servlet response to set the cookie header.
      Returns:
      HTTP 200 (OK) with a logout confirmation message.

    • requestPasswordReset

      @POST @Path("/password-reset") @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response requestPasswordReset(jakarta.json.JsonObject emailJSON, @HeaderParam("Accept-Language") String language)
      Handles requests to initiate a password reset process. Generates a password reset token and sends it via email if the user exists.
      Parameters:
      emailJSON - The JSON object containing the user's email.
      language - The language preference from the Accept-Language header.
      Returns:
      HTTP 201 (Created) if the process is successful, or an error response.

    • checkPasswordReset

      @GET @Path("/password-reset") @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response checkPasswordReset(@HeaderParam("token") String passwordResetTokenValue)
      Checks the validity of a password reset token.
      Parameters:
      passwordResetTokenValue - The token value from the request header.
      Returns:
      HTTP 200 (OK) if the token is valid, otherwise an error response.

    • updatePassword

      @PATCH @Path("/password-reset") @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response updatePassword(@HeaderParam("token") String passwordResetTokenValue, jakarta.json.JsonObject newPasswordJSON)
      Updates the user's password using a valid password reset token.
      Parameters:
      passwordResetTokenValue - The token value from the request header.
      newPasswordJSON - The JSON object containing the new password.
      Returns:
      HTTP 200 (OK) if the password is updated, otherwise an error response.

    • requestAuthCode

      @POST @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response requestAuthCode(@Valid @Valid RequestAuthCodeDTO requester)
      Handles requests for generating a two-factor authentication code.
      Parameters:
      requester - The DTO containing the requester's email.
      Returns:
      HTTP 200 (OK) with the authentication code, or an error response.
